text: @MarshaBlackburn So, Republicans want to give Americans the right to sue China over this but also want to take away their right to sue an employer that provides an unsafe work environment as #COVID19 continues to spread within our country. That makes ZERO sense.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
